hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir:A man was buried along with my father and I did not like it till I took him (i.e. my father) out and buried him in a separate grave

chapter.ara-name: باب هَلْ يُخْرَجُ الْمَيِّتُ مِنَ الْقَبْرِ وَاللَّحْدِ لِعِلَّةٍ
chapter.eng-name: Can the dead body be taken out of its grave
